description: Specifies a user's permissions. For more information, see Security and Permissions. Required Permissions: To use this action, an IAM user must have a Manage permissions level for the stack, or an attached policy that explicitly grants permissions. For more information on user permissions, see Managing User Permissions.

parameters.name: IamUserArn
parameters.description: The user's IAM ARN. This can also be a federated user's ARN.

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description: The user's permission level, which must be set to one of the following strings. You cannot set your own permissions level. deny show deploy manage iam_only For more information about the permissions associated with these levels, see Managing User Permissions.
